void Release ()
 ~MutexObtainer ()

Detailed Description

Obtains a mutex in the constructor and automatically releases the mutex in the destructor.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

MutexObtainer::MutexObtainer (  Mutex *  mtx,
const Ticks &  timeout
) 
 

Obtains the mutex mtx.

Parameters:
mtx Pointer to the mutex, which should be obtained.
timeout Timeout for obtaining.

MutexObtainer::MutexObtainer (  Mutex *  mtx  ) 
 

Instead of calling MutexObtainer(mtc, Ticks::Infinite())

MutexObtainer::~MutexObtainer (   )  [inline]
 

Releases the mutex, if it has not already been released by Release.
